Reviews.Title: Best Phone I Ever Got Myself
Reviews.Author: Calvin C. GRAHAM "KILLA CAL"
Reviews.Content: Iphone is way overrated... I stick to the Android team and got this at a very low price... I was happy with this phone. So much so that just last week I went ahead and ordered my daughter one of these instead of the iphone she wanted so badly (once I talked her out of it because I know myself how iphones are).. plus with Boostmobile service how can you go wrong? I win!!

Reviews.Title: zte boost warp
Reviews.Author: whatsyourscent
Reviews.Content: i got this phone didnt even have it a yr n it crashes all the time n now it wont let me charge the phone will never buy a zte warp ever again

Reviews.Title: Almost like the first ZTE WARP
Reviews.Author: CHALMETTE, LA
Reviews.Content: it is just about the same as far as operating it.  I is just a lot faster in loading things

Reviews.Title: ZTE WARP
Reviews.Author: Michael Zzi
Reviews.Content: This phone is great . YOU CAN NOT beat it for the price. Android , 4G  ,good  battery life and a large rich display. I am very happy with this phone and it Serves me well  running around in NYC.

Reviews.Title: I don't recommend this phone.
Reviews.Author: Ericka
Reviews.Content: This phone has a 1 year manufacture warranty.  I tried to return my phone and under no circumstance would they repair or replace.  This phone keeps crashing and the battery goes dead after it has a full battery.  Why?  I would not recommend this for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Horrible signal
Reviews.Author: kate
Reviews.Content: The signal is no good I drop calls all day. This is the 2nd boost phone I bought and same thing with both.

Reviews.Title: Item stopped working
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It work fine for 3 months then, screen just lights up and nothing more. Too late to return to replace item.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE EXPLAIN WHY ITS DOING THIS!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: John Heacock
Reviews.Content: SCREEN GOING OUT!!!!!!!!! AND KEEPS POPPING UP A DIFFERENT COLORED SCREEN!!!!!! NOT SURE WHAT IT IS BUT ITS LIKE THE SCREENS GOING OUT AND STUFF BLENDING TOGETHER!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: ITS GREAT!!!...
Reviews.Author: I. Michelle Newman
Reviews.Content: Im Enjoying My New, ZTE Warp 4G Boost Cellphone, Very Much!!!... I Recommend This Cellphone 100%!!!... Its A GREAT Cellphone!!!...

Reviews.Title: warp g 4 better than most
Reviews.Author: shirleyrowland
Reviews.Content: Husband has one and swears its a better phone. So, he is right, about the choice for me to try it.

Reviews.Title: this phone is wonderful
Reviews.Author: D. HUGGINS
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it is great...  Great big screen for easy viewing. You should really try this phone.  Good luck

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: The phone crashes on me from time to time I wish I would have never gotten this phone but it's cool

Camera: 8-MP
Input: Touchscreen
